text: Sharon Cohen (born February 2, 1972), better known as Dana International, is an Israeli pop singer. She has released eight albums and three compilation albums. She is a trans woman. Dana International won the Eurovision Song Contest in 1998 with the song "Diva". She later returned to the contest in 2011 with the song "Ding Dong", but her song did not qualify for the final. == References == * Dana International Official Website Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Eurovision Song Contest winners Category:Israeli LGBT people Category:Israeli pop singers Category:Jewish Israeli musicians Category:LGBT singers Category:Singers from Tel Aviv Category:Transgender Jews Category:Transgender women
title: Dana International
